name: Sorcerer Survivors
description:
Beware of giant enemy spiders and scorpions!

You do not control the weapons directly but instead have to avoid the constantly spawning enemies and the slowly ramping up difficulty.

Survive as long as possible!

Credit to Ranga and Beef Jake'd for epic shtuffs art and shtuff and sownd and shtuff.

This is not a vampire survivors clone. Definitely not.
